title: Survival of spaceship earth
creator_credit: United Productions of America and Dirk Summers
brief_description: Fosters an understanding of the effects technological development and human population have had on the earth’s ecology. Features Hugh Downs, Margaret Mead, John D. Rockefeller III, Lady Barbara Ward Jackson, Harrison Brown, and Walter Orr Roberts. Narrated by Raymond Burr.
